pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:0.2_0: The account of the nun Analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:0.5_0: The training rule on taking leave of an available monk
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.10_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.11.1_0: ‘If a nun sits down on a seat in front of a monk without asking permission, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.2_0: nuns sat down on seats in front of a monk without asking permission.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.3_0: But the monks complained and criticized him,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.4_0: “How can nuns sit down on a seat without asking permission?” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:1.9_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.1.10_0: even if she sits down on the ground, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.1.6_0: in front of one who is fully ordained.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.1_0: If she has not asked permission, and she does not perceive that she has, and she sits down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.2_0: If she has not asked permission, but she is unsure of it, and she sits down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.3_0: If she has not asked permission, but she perceives that she has, and she sits down on a seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.4_0: If she has taken leave, but she does not perceive that she has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.5_0: If she has taken leave, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.2.6_0: If she has taken leave, and she perceives that she has, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.3.2_0: if she sits down on the seat after asking permission;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.3.4_0: They burn in times of trouble,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.3.6_0: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc94:2.3.7_0: The eleventh rule, the training rule on eleventh day, is finished.
